name: terminalHacker (hklabs)
description:
GUILTY CONSCIENCE:
The environment you see was provided by the course masters, the logic behind is it mine.
The game was developed as part of the aforementioned course.

HOW TO PLAY:
At the main screen, press 1, 2 or 3 to select difficulty level. 

You could also try typing a few extra things. 

I've included some Easter eggs in the game. Hit me up with a screen shot if you find all.

After selecting the difficulty, you will get a jumbled up word. This is the very word that you have
to crack. Un-jumble it to get the password. 

As the difficulty increases, the words become harder.

Every level has different words meant to be cracked, meaning you can the play the game multiple 
times and still not have gone through all the words.

If you choose to play in the full screen mode and want to exit, press 'Alt+F4'.

Although it won't matter much in this game, you can choose the graphics quality.  Try ultra!!

INSTRUCTIONS

You are a school kid in the '90s very much involved in hacking things. You have developed this
terminal hacker which lets you hack into different servers.

Enjoy and tell me how you liked it and/or found any bugs!

Open [2_Terminal_Hacker.exe]
